description: Deficient numbers n such that n-s(n)-s(n-s(n)) = s(s(n))-s(n) or s(n-s(n))-n+s(n) = s(n)-s(s(n)).
prog: (PARI) s(n) = sigma(n)-n; t(n) = n-s(n)-s(n-s(n)); z(n) = s(s(n))-s(n); for(n=29,10^8, if(t(n)==z(n),print(n)))
author: _Naohiro Nomoto_
extensions: More terms from Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Aug 30 2001
